Title: Directs the New York State Department of Transportation to promulgate rules and regulations for the standardization of public charging stations for electric vehicles
Summary: Directs the New York State Department of Transportation, in conjunction with the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority and the New York Power Authority, to promulgate rules and regulations for the standardization of public charging stations for electric vehicles.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York State Department of Transportation, in conjunction with the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority and the New York Power Authority, to promulgate rules and regulations for the standardization of public charging stations for electric vehicles
